allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
ci: enable GitHub Pages automatic deployment

- Updated baseUrl to /robots2026/ to match repository name
- Updated projectName to robots2026 for correct GitHub Pages deployment
- Created GitHub Actions workflow for automatic deployment to GitHub Pages
- Added PHR documenting the deployment setup

The workflow will automatically build and deploy the Docusaurus site
to GitHub Pages on pushes to main/master branches.

Files modified:
- book/docusaurus.config.js
- .github/workflows/deploy-docusaurus.yml
- history/prompts/001-docusaurus-robotics/003-deploy-docusaurus-setup.phr.md

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
